11.content:
The is a well known knowledge about the school that had dorms. There are up to seven unexplained mysteries all around.

However this was not the case. There were just five and all include a beautifull girl.

Well, that might be expected considering your school was an all boys school just separate by mere 20 yards of trees from an all girls School. Telling the true it was the same school, some teacher even teach at both sides, it was just that the male and female students were supposed to learn better if they were not mixed along.

Anyway, this story is not about the history of the Moonlight Academy, but my story and the consequences of my curiosity.

Everything began when I got caught by the stories about the Five Mysteries. I had always had a fond on ghost stories. It was barely my first week at the academy, so I couldn't actually wait to go in the adveture to solve the mistery.

I stood on the school library that friday until the anouncement of the closing.

That's when I began to move, not awared what will be of me after that.
11.title: The Five Mysteries

For so very long, i had been floating around in a tank of some sort and never had anything else to do but either entertain or frighten anyone who stumbled upon our freak show itself until one day something happened.

As i was floating around in my tank as usual, my body started vibrating and glowing as my transformation into an anthropomorphic cartoon animal itself happened as i busted open the lid of the tank and climbed out as my transformation came to an end having already transformed into of that of a....

As i sort of transformed into Tails the fox from the adventures of sonic the hedgehog but with only one tail instead of two, when i was about to go through the same ordeal as Garfield the cat did back in the fall of '88.

Indeed i now had an ravenous appetite, as i began invading every fast food joint, all you can buffet, and every candy shop or ice cream parlor in the tri-state area as nothing was left standing.

Soon afterwards, i needed a break from eating everything in sight until somehow as a result i became a now King Kong sized monster fox who was now looming over everything and everyone around me.

15131.content:
There was once a man called Lance, about 50 years old. he had a good life, a good family, and a great house.

but he was quite fascinated with age regression. "Imagine," he thought, "being able to regress to your younger days!"

how does he regress
15131.title: a man called Lance

151311.content:
one day, Lance came in from his job as a garden worker. he found the house empty. his kids were not yet back from school, and his wife was not yet back from working at her supermarket checkout woman.

"Maybe I could just have a nap now." he said. He felt very tired. He removed his shoes, lay on the sofa, and fell fast asleep.

but as he slept, he slowly began to regress in age!

when he woke up, what was his age now?
151311.title: He wakes up younger

1513111.content:
he was a year younger, now 49 years old.

it was hardly noticeable.
1513111.title: a year younger

choices: he regresses to half his age
15131111.content:
Lance, of course, looked like himself in the Ratchet & Clank games, excpet he had 5 fingers on his hands. and he looked 1 year younger.

until now.

because, he suddenly felt tingly, and regressed to 40 years old.
15131111.title: he regresses to 40 years old

151311111.content:
all at once, this happened:

Lance began to regress in age even more.

His muscles deflated, he started breathing heavily, and he was shrinking down as well.

his mustache shrank a little, and his clothing sagged.

he regressed down to half his former age - 25 years old.

"What?" he said, his voice sounding different, almost younger. "What's happening to me?"
151311111.title: he regresses to half his age

1513111111.content:
within seconds, he suddenly regressed even more.

he went from 25 years to 20 years old, then down to 18 years old, roughly round his teenage years.

He realized that his shirt was now at least 8 sizes too large for him. Looking down at his hands, he saw that all he could see were sleeves.
1513111111.title: he regresses to 18 years old

15131111112.content:
All at once, Lance felt himself regressing even more.

he regressed down to a kid, roughly around 10 years old.

His clothes now dwarfed him, and his mustache had gone.

"Ugh... what happened?" he said, then gasped. his voice sounded much higher, and younger.

looking at his hands, he saw that all he could see were sleeves.

then...

"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!" HE screamed, upon seeing his reflection in the bedroom mirror.

"What's happened to me?! I'm 10 years old again!!!"

Lance stumbled back, and fell over. he struggled up, shedding his pants, shoes, and socks in the process.

He ran down the hall, his bare feet pounding on the carpet. "Get a hold of yourself, Lance." he said.

"What if your wife finds out about what happened to you?!"

just then, he heard the doorbell. His eyes widened in terror. "Coming!" he called, as he ran for the door.

He opened it, and who would be at the door but...
15131111112.title: Lance regresses to a kid

151311112.content:
Throughout the rest of the day, he gradually regressed, slowly, but surely, down in age.

By dinnertime, he was now 39.

at 7pm, he was 38.

by 9pm, he was now 37.

by 11pm, at bedtime, he had become 36 years old.

Next day...
151311112.title: he starts gradually getting younger

151331.content:
A 52 year old dad named Martin Wizztabin was out on a family hike in the country with his wife Lizzy and his son Timmy.

Suddenly, the ground slipped from under his feet and he slid down a steep hill, landing with a big splash in a big glowing pond. It wasn't long till his wfe and his son came to the rescue.

Unknowingly, Martin had fallen into a pond of youth, where it's water could make anyone younger.
151331.title: A dad who falls into a pond of youth on a famil...

1513311.content:
They reached a nearby cabin they'd parked their car at, so that they could dry Martin off.

Martin sat down on a wooden chair, and removed his wet hiking boots and socks.

As Martin dried off, he made a startling discovery: he found the pond he'd fell into had age regression properties, spreading de-aging atoms throughout his body.

"0h my goodness! What's happening to me?! I'm... I'm getting younger..."

Indeed he was.

He sat in the chair, wriggling his toes, as he regressed in age.

he regressed al the way to....
1513311.title: He regresses to a set age

152331.content:
This fellow reader is a story entitled adventures of the bloated monsters featuring a combination of certain characters undergoing a monster transformation, a superhero or super villain transformation, and of course going giant while becoming bloated as a result of my experimental soda as well. Enjoy!

The Place: My laboratory in Metropolis U.S.A or wherever I'm traveling to around the world.

The timeline: the late 1980's and early 1990's.

The year: 1989 the end of a decade that was the 1980's while the cold war and major global events of that timeline were happening

The situation so far: I Dr. Meow Kent a mild mannered and world renowned yellow robot cat scientist who graduated with honors from the robot animal factory, developed an experimental kind of food in this case super sushi and experimental drink in other words super soda that not only transformed me into a bloated yet going giant superhero in this case super Pawaemon but also my sweetie pie Mariko a pink colored robot cat and performer as well, alongside deputy sheriff Kid Dora a robot cat who's with the Metropolis police department as well and inspector Wang Dora who also works for the Metropolis police department as well.

Somewhere around the world, my experimental super sushi and super soda had been the latest trend of the 1980's scientific community itself, as test subjects around the world tried both the super sushi and super soda with some surprising side effects as well.

But however a group of super villains and the like around the world had been watching in the shadows, whilst coming up with their version of my experiments as well.

15233222221.content:
it all began with a famous sea captain, called Johnny Fishernon.

He liked fish a lot.

He liked to explore the ocean, and see all the fish he could find.

One day, he was lying on the deck of his boat, and he was thinking about all the fish in the sea.

And he was wondering what it would be like to be a fish.

'it would be nice to be a fish.' he thought. 'swimming carefree in the ocean.'

Turns out Johnny had always having dreamed of beings a fish. He figured out that he was transforming into whatever fish he wanted. 'Damn,' he thought, 'there are so many fish, but what should I transform into?'

also, would he become part fish or full fish?

'maybe,' he thought, 'i don't have to be a full fish. I can be part of a fish.'

"Maybe I can be part fish for a hour or so, to see if i like it." he said to himself.

He then took off his boots and socks, rolled up the legs of his pants and put his bare feet into the shallow patch of water near his dock near the beach near his house.

he lowered himself in. the water came up above his knees. he walked up the shallow patch and back to his boat.

he heaved himself back onto his boat, and stared down at his feet, waiting for the changes...

all too soon, it was quittin' time, and he headed for his apartment.

once back home, he took off his boots and socks, and saw how mud-stained his feet were.
1523322222211111211.title: quitting time

15233222222111112111.content:
Sid stripped down to his underpants.
Like Fred from Big hero 6, he wore his underwear differently.

"I wear them front, I wear them back, I go inside out, and then I go front and back."

he suddenly felt his feet hurting.
he saw his new feet - they were huge, green, had long sharp toenails, and smelt as vile as the garbage around him. [That wasn't surprising to Sid - he loved the smell of the garbage, and the smell of his own socks.]

SUDDENLY!!!

Sid just so happened to sneeze, and with a snorting pop, his nose changed into that of a pig snout!
"Oh my!" he said. "Those mean uncouth fugitive punks always say I'm a pig, but i guess they never imagined i'd be pig-faced!" He let out a loud snort of laughter.

SUDDENLY!!!

His body changed from slim and lean to jellybelly fat.
What gives? he wondered, scratching the back of his neck and discovering that he was in need of a haircut.

but then he felt a sharp pricking feeling on the back of his neck.

When he looked at his hands, he saw; not his regular hands, but something green, and larger, with gnarled fingers that had hairs growing on them. and his fingernails were now much longer, and all ended in sharp points.

Sid pulled his undies off, and saw his penis: it had turned a sickly green, and had huge purple warts on it. "OH my!" he said. Some of his teeth were now much longer and sharper too.

he watched in horror as his pig snout nose grew bigger. his voice deepened. "Wow." he said. "I'm gettin' hideous."
15233222222111112111.title: Sid tfs

152332222221111121111.content:
SUDDENLY!

Sid felt a sharp chest pain. His belly was now expanding at an alarming rate.

then, he felt himself getting something that felt like a heart attack. he collapsed to the floor, shouting and screaming in pain.
then, his arms swelled up. It looked painful as they throbbed big and purple. The man's legs did the same.

his hair completely fell out, leaving him bald.
he felt himself age about 12 years or so older.
then, he felt hideous warts grow over his hideous body. "What-whh-what's HAPPENING TO MEEEEEEARRRK!!!!"

Then there was silence. Sid tried to speak, but what came out was "NYARGLEBARGLE!"

Sidmouth 'Sid' Trimpasi, nicknamed 'Stink Bomb' by the other garbage workers at the dump, was now a hideous ugly mutant! And he was unable to wear clothing; not that he needed it now, anyway.
152332222221111121111.title: Final steps of tf

One day, he was busy working on the plants in a greenhouse, when he suddenly came too near a strange weed that bit his arm! He managed to get the weed off, and get the bleeding under control, but he didn't know that weed that bit him would turn him into a plant monster!

where does his plant tf start
1523322222222221.title: plant tf

15233222222222221.content:
Stan; he was a 32 year old man. He had a brown hair at the top of his head, brown eyes, and he wore thick glasses, a brown plaid shirt, blue jeans, and black shoes. He was quite thin and lanky for his age, with a small belly.

He lived alone in his house, in the grassy plains.

One afternoon, he was at home on his computer, but then he noticed an ad for a new site called 'Tf-me.co.uk.

"What is it?" he thought, out of curiosity. He went to the site. and a box showed he needed to register. After he registered, he saw a full body picture of himself on the screen, with his name, details, and all other stuff like that.

Then, it showed the possible tfs it could do:

Animal tf: bring out your wild side
body modification: new bods in more ways than one
Age regression: experience your youth again
size change: have a big or small view on things
monster tf: give people a real fright with this new look
transgender: enter the world of the ladies.

Stan was amazed. He really wished he could transform into something else.

"OK." he said. "What shall I choose for my transformation?"

he mulled over the options for a while, and then, he picked:
15233222222222221.title: Stan on the tf web

152332222222222211.content:
Stan picked the animal tf option. He always wondered what it'd be like to become an animal.
"I wonder what it'd be like to be an animal." he said to himself
Almost immediately up came the first question:

'Which type of animal do you want to transform into?'

Stan read the question, then, it showed the possible choices:

furry: fur-covered animals like Cats and dogs, and wolves.
Scaly animals: scale creatures, like snakes, dragons, lizards, and such.
fish: feel fishy with these fish tfs, like sharks, cod, barracuda, octopus
insect: experience a bug's life as a bug, like a spider, a bee, a butterfly, or an ant
bird: fly high in the sky as a sparrow, a eagle, or pigeon or any other bird type.
misc: the miscellaneous animals section, for animals like frogs, sheep, cows, you name it.
random: a random choice quickly for you.
chimera tf: gain different animal parts on your body, and amaze your friends.

Stan was amazed. "I'd like these." he said. "But which one shall I pick?" He placed a hand on his chin thoughtfully.
152332222222222211.title: animal tf

1523322222222222111.content:
after some thought that Stan picked the furry option.

after the process went up that it poped with another question: 'What kind of furry animal do you wanna be?'

then it showed the options, like last time:

dog
cat
giraffe
kangaroo
raccoon
bat
mouse
horse
rabbit
bear
hyena
other furry animals
part-furry, part man

there were so many options THAT Stan had to think this through carefully. He placed a hand on his chin thoughtfully.

some animals had fangs, but the others didn't. he also didn't want to have an instant tf; which mean he'd turn wild in his chair, slowly hurting himself due to lack of sudden pains. Then, there was the size of space needed for the animal to run that turning into something small could work, but the bigger options like a moose wouldn't work as they needed more space, like the woods. He even lived just next door to a small uninhabited forest area, where he liked to take walks in.

The half-furry option would give him half the body of a random furry animal. probably a wolf, or possibly even a horse.
"Which one should i choose?" Stan said to himself that He then shut his eyes to think. when he opened up his eyes that he decided to pick...
1523322222222222111.title: furry

152332222222222211121.content:
Stan picked the 'bat' option.

the next step was the speed of the tf, which he set to 'gradual'.

then, up came the final step; setting a timer for the transformation's start.

he set the timer for 'now'.

then, a message popped up. it said, 'if you are happy with these settings, press ok. If not, press redo.'
Stan grinned. He was ready for his shark tf to begin. he pressed the ok button, and almost immediately, Stan felt a sharp tingle. the tingle spread all over his body, from the top of his head to the tips of his fingers to the ends of his toes.

then he felt the changes happening.

As he removed his clothes, this is what happened:

his feet elongated, gaining clawed toes,
and he gained long fingers on his hands.
then, his ears grew bat-like, and he gained fangs.
bristly fur in the colour of his brown hair grew all over his body, save for his head.
His body then grew very skinny.
his nose widened then pushed up, and bat wings formed on his arms.

He was a giant bat!
152332222222222211121.title: bat

152332222222222211221.content:
Stan picked the fish option.

after that process went up, up came another question: 'What fish do you wanna be?'

then it showed the options, like last time:

shark
cod
barracuda
whale
octopus
dolphin
bass
carp
squid
part-fish, part man

THAT was where Stan had to think carefully. He placed a hand on his chin thoughtfully.

The dolphin had lungs, but the others didn't. and he didn't want to have an instant tf; that mean he'd flop about on his chair, slowly suffocating due to lack of air. Then, there was the size of water needed for the fish to breathe. Running his bath deep could work for the smaller options, but the bigger ones would need more space, like the ocean. He lived next to a small uninhabited beach area, where he liked to walk.

The half-fish option would give him half the body of a random fish, possibly with gills.

"Which one shall I become?" Stan said to himself. He shut his eyes to think. then, he decided to pick...
152332222222222211221.title: fishy

1523322222222222112211.content:
Stan picked the 'Shark' option.

the next step was the speed of the tf, which he set to 'gradual'.

then, up came the final step; setting a timer for the transformation's start.

he set the timer for '30 minute delay'.

then, a message popped up. it said, 'if you are happy with these settings, press ok. If not, press redo.'
Stan grinned. He was ready for his shark tf to begin. he pressed the ok button, and almost immediately, Stan felt a sharp tingle. the tingle spread all over his body, from the top of his head to the tips of his fingers to the ends of his toes.

then a message popped up. 'TF complete. Enjoy your new tf.' it said. There was a timer counting down, that was the timer to his tf. Stan logged off, then prepared himself for his shark transformation.

He went down to the beach, with a bag to put his clothes in it, since he knew his clothes would possibly not last the tf.

30 minutes later, as he sat down, and removed his clothes, the tf began.

First, his feet and hands bulged, then gained webbing inbetween the fingers and toes. then, he gained gills on his neck, then a huge back fin, his nose stretched into a shark muzzle, his legs became a fish tail, then his body became more & more shark like, as his arms turned into fins, his teeth became sharp, and his hair faded.

Soon, Stan was now a huge shark!!!!
1523322222222222112211.title: shark

Stan mulled over the options for a while that he then decided to pick on the monster tf option. He always wondered what it would be like to become a monster that he said it to himself. "I wonder what it'll be like to be a monster."

Almost immediately, it came up with the first question. 'Which type of monster do you want to transform into?' as Stan read the question in thought that he then saw the possible choices:

Beast: fur-covered monsters like werewolves, yetis, and so on.
Scaly monsters: scale creatures, like dragons, nagas, and such.
fish: feel fishy with these fish tfs, like the creature of the black lagoon.
insect: experience a monstrous life as a bug, with a spider, a bee, a butterfly, or even ant parts.
bird: fly high in the sky as a gryphon, or any other monster bird.
misc: the miscellaneous monsters section, for monsters like zombies, vampires, Frankensteins, you name it.
random: a random choice that quickly chooses for you.
chimera tf: gain different animal/monster parts on your body, and amaze your friends, or even become a chimera.

Stan was very much amazed. "I'd like these options." he said. "But which one should I pick?" as He placed a hand on his chin, thoughtfully that he chose...
15233222222222221221.title: monster

152332222222222212221.content:
Stan picked the size change option.

almost immediately, up came the question:
'Which size change do you want?'

he saw that It had 3 choices, and 3 possible answers:

grow
shrink
[secret]

Stan thought about it. He always liked size changing. He imagined himself stomping around as a 50-foot giant. On the other hand, he always was fascinated with shrinking in films, and always wondered what it'd be like to be extremely tiny; being nearly microscopic size.

of course, he wondered what the secret choice was. "it must be something special." he said. "If it's that something special."

"which one shall I pick?" He placed a hand on his chin thoughtfully.

so which one did Stan pick for the change?

up came another question:

Stan chose quick for this option.

then he set the option to no for the question 'Will your clothing shrink with you?'

and finally, the last question: 'what timer will you have for your shrinkage.'

Stan chose the 1 minute delay option.

then, a message popped up. it said, 'if you are happy with these settings, press ok. If not, press redo.'
Stan grinned. He was ready for his shrinking to begin. he pressed the ok button, and almost immediately, Stan felt a sharp tingle. the tingle spread all over his body, from the top of his head to the tips of his fingers to the ends of his toes.

Once it was over, Stan felt himself getting smaller; for his clothes were getting looser.
